'''Trys Kiirendal''' was a [[half-elf]] [[ranger]] and [[adventurer]] for hire in the city of [[Neverwinter]], active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Trys Kiirendal spent most of her life sheltered from the world and danger by her father. Eventually, however, she came to pursue an adventurer's career by [[1479 DR]]. Despite her youth and lack of experience, Kiirendal offered her services in adventuring and retrieving crafting components for defenders of Neverwinter.
